```{r}
a<-2
b<-5
r1<-a+b
r2<-a-b
r3<-a*b
r4<-a/b
v1<-c(r1,r2,r3,r4)
v1 <- c(v1, r5<-a**b)
v1
v2<-c("sum", "difference", "product", "ratio", "exponentiation")
v2
df<-data.frame(Results=v1,Operation=v2)
df
df[3,1]
```
